original_title: Hunting teenager killed in gun mishap
original_body_lines: A 14-year-old child was killed after a locally made weapon went off accidentally in a jungle at Kattamuri in Vakarai, Police said.
They said the child had gone hunting with his elder brother and two brothers-in-law when the locally made weapon they had carried had gone off.
The three individuals who went hunting with the child were arrested in connection with the incident.
